survey_name: Community Feedback on Public Park Improvements Survey
survey_brief: This survey aims to gather community input on potential improvements and usage patterns of local public parks to better meet resident needs.

questions.question_text: How often do you visit your local public park?
questions.client_notes: Use a single-choice radio button for clarity. Ensure mobile-friendly layout.

script.question_text: How often do you visit your local public park?

questions.question_text: Which of the following activities do you typically engage in at the park? (Select all that apply)
questions.routing_logic: Appears for respondents who selected 'Daily', 'Weekly', or 'Monthly' in Q1.
questions.client_notes: Use checkboxes for multi-select. Include an 'Other' option with open-text field.
questions.scripter_notes: Field type: checkbox (MULTI_CHOICE) with optional text input for 'Other'.

script.question_text: Which of the following activities do you typically engage in at the park? (Select all that apply)
script.routing_logic: Appears for respondents who selected 'Daily', 'Weekly', or 'Monthly' in Q1.

questions.question_text: What improvements would you like to see in your local park? (Select up to 3)
questions.client_notes: Use a multi-select dropdown with a 3-option limit. Include validation.
questions.scripter_notes: Field type: multi-choice dropdown with max selection = 3.

script.question_text: What improvements would you like to see in your local park? (Select up to 3)

questions.question_text: How satisfied are you with the current maintenance and cleanliness of the park?
questions.client_notes: Use a 5-point Likert scale with radio buttons. Randomize order for bias reduction.
questions.scripter_notes: Field type: radio button (SINGLE_CHOICE). Randomize option order.

script.question_text: How satisfied are you with the current maintenance and cleanliness of the park?

questions.question_text: Would you be willing to participate in volunteer park cleanup or improvement events?
questions.routing_logic: Appears for respondents who selected 'Satisfied' or higher in Q4.
questions.client_notes: Single-choice with a neutral option. Ideal for future engagement planning.

script.question_text: Would you be willing to participate in volunteer park cleanup or improvement events?
script.routing_logic: Appears for respondents who selected 'Satisfied' or higher in Q4.

questions.question_text: Please share any additional comments or suggestions for improving the park.
questions.client_notes: Open-text field with a 500-character limit. Useful for qualitative insights.
questions.scripter_notes: Field type: open-text with character counter.

script.question_text: Please share any additional comments or suggestions for improving the park.
